entry.title: Student consultation meetings
entry.summary: Student consultation meetings (sometimes called 'office hours') are designated times in which academic staff will be available to students in…
entry.content:
Student consultation meetings (sometimes called 'office hours') are designated times in which academic staff will be available to students in order to have a conversation about wellbeing, offer feedback on a students progress, specific summative or formative assessments, and/or have an in depth discussion of an academic area in which the student is interested.
